about_the_game:
Choice of designs

You can load and use your own created or downloaded stones, boards, backgrounds, and BGM from the local files on your PC.

Please refer to the in-game manual on how to create your own stones, boards, backgrounds, BGM, and CPUs.

You can choose from a variety of stones, boards, backgrounds, and BGM used during the match.

New themes can be earned as rewards in CPU battles.

Play against a self-made CPU

You can play against a CPU you've created yourself or downloaded from online sources by loading it from a local file on your PC.

You can get new opponents as rewards for playing against the CPU.

Multiple Game Modes

In addition to the normal match, you can choose from other modes such as a one-color match or a lose-by-selection mode.

Online Battles

Up to 10 players will play on one board, split into black and white turns.

The "position" for placing the stone is decided according to the player's choice for each turn, and players can choose from options such as "Most Selected" or "First Selected"

Competing with the audience

Streamers can compete against audience by using the chat function on the streaming site.

You may freely post gameplay videos of this game and its demo version, whether you are an individual or a corporation, whether it is free or paid. No permission is required (even if you do, we probably won't be able to reply). We will not contact you after the fact about such actions or charge you a fee (however, please refrain from using it in a way that goes against public order and morals).

  • Please try the demo version.

  • The demo version allows you to try out most of the features of the release version.

  • The demo version allows you to play against other demo version players online.

  • The original stones, boards, backgrounds, BGM, and CPUs created for loading and use in the demo version can also be used in the release version.

name: REVERSI xVSx

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built In
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: REVERSI xVSx is a party game where 1 to 10 people can play Reversi using self-made stone, board, terrain, and BGM. Up to 5 vs 5 battles can be played against the CPU or online. You can also compete against a self-made CPU using your own videos and thinking routines.
